channel.title: Posts on Tom Beckett
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tom Beckett

item.title: Why blog? Why now?
item.description: I don’t really like blogging as a concept. My reaction is due to the tech world inisiting every engineer should be blogging and how you should feel bad if you dont. I’m a fairly private person with little to no online presence. Despite this I’ve wanted to blog for a few years. As a side effect, I’m pretty guilty for sending my friends walls of text about my diehard feelings on various tech topics.
